            <entry>44c5f1e0-9d36-4992-adb8-8687f0378379#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Irányvektor és pont</string>
            <string language="en">directing vector and the point</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung des Vektors und des Punktes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">diriger le vecteur et le point</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dirigindo o vetor e o ponto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dirigere vettore ed il punto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατεύθυνση του διανύσματος και του σημείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dirigir vector y la punta</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az egyenes megadása egy ponttal és egy irányvektorral.</string>
            <string language="en">directive vector and the point contribute to a straight line </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">11. osztály,  kép,  </string>
            <string language="en">11. class,   picture,    </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">richtungweisender Vektor und der Punkt tragen zu 
einer geraden Geraden bei</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le vecteur directif et le point contribuent à une
ligne droite</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o vetor diretivo e o ponto contribuem a uma linha 
reta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">il vettore direttivo ed il punto contribuiscono ad
una linea retta</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το διάνυσμα οδηγιών και το σημείο συμβάλλουν σε μια 
ευθεία γραμμή</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el vector directivo y la punta contribuyen a una 
línea recta</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">11. Kategorie, Abbildung,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">11. classe, image,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">11. classe, retrato,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">11. codice categoria, immagine,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">11, κλάση, εικόνα,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">11. clase, cuadro,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
